content:
# It appears that the insertion of 10 iron ore into the furnace did not succeed, as my inventory still shows only 3 iron gear wheels and no iron ore. The furnace is currently working with 9 iron ore remaining.
# 
# This indicates that the furnace is still operational and has enough materials to continue producing iron plates. I will monitor the furnace's output until it completes the current batch of iron ore.
# 
# I will wait a moment to see how many iron plates are produced.

# Waiting for the smelting process to complete.
for _ in range(20):  # Maximum wait time of 20 seconds
    if inspect_inventory()[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 30:  # Checking if I have at least 30 iron plates.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an error if smelting didn't finish.

# After that, I will check the inventory again.
